verses.roman:
āvaraṇa dūra kari' karila vidite
mahā-bhārī ṭhākura--keha nāre cālāite

synonyms: āvaraṇa—the covering; dūra kari'-clearing away; karila vidite—declared; mahā-bhārī—very heavy; ṭhākura—the Deity; keha—anyone; nāre—not able; cālāite—to cause to move.
translation: After they cleansed the body of the Deity, some of them said, "The Deity is very heavy. No one person can move Him."
